example.code:
PS C:\> Remove-EC2NetworkAclEntry -NetworkAclId acl-12345678 -Egress $false -RuleNumber 100
Confirm Are you sure you want to perform this action? Performing operation "Remove-EC2NetworkAclEntry (DeleteNetworkAclEntry)" on Target "acl-12345678". [Y] Yes [A] Yes to All [N] No [L] No to All [S] Suspend [?] Help (default is "Y"):
example.description: This example removes the specified rule from the specified network ACL. You are prompted for confirmation before the operation proceeds, unless you also specify the Force parameter.
